name: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape 2
description: Experience your deepest fears within the frightening walls of Dr. Psycho's Hospital. Is this gloomy asylum the result of your own tormented mind? Go through blood-chilling challenges, find hidden items and face terrifying psychopaths. Will you escape this nightmare or become its eternal prisoner?

name: The Legend of Ogorets 3: Kikimora
description: An interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Reader beware.

name: Living Dolls Rebirth Alpha
description: Welcome in this fantasy Adult world. Enjoy and explore this world and its inhabitants freely! This open world for PC will blow your mind!

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - The Mole Hole
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - Coach Joe's Dungeon Gym
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - Treasure Trunks
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Quest Monster: The Dark Prince - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes
description: "Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes" is the 5th work in the "Paper Bride' series. Our cast from Zangling Village return to the stage to welcome players back to the world of paper bride...

name: Sanguivore: Twenty Below
description: Survive and strategize with friends in Sanguivore, a first-person escape-room style nightmare. Your mission: lead your team to safety through one of multiple escape routes, while evading bloodthirsty monsters hunting you. Work together to survive.

name: Die in the Dungeon: Origins
description: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and discover the story behind Die in the Dungeon!

name: Mutation Madness
description: Mutation Madness invites you to a thrilling virus-blasting challenge! Armed with your disinfectant gun, defeat waves of mutating viruses and save Cell City from the Madvirus outbreak! Upgrade your gun and use powerful items, while unraveling information about the virus.

name: Super Spy Raccoon
description: Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to acquire all classified documents as you venture deeper and deeper into enemy territory. Hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory!

name: Hidden Cats In Amusement Park
description: This is a casual and relaxing hidden object game. Find cute cats in the amusement park.Can you find them? That's right，there are a few on the carousel.

name: Anarchy Park
description: Welcome to Anarchy Park! An Isometric Boss Rush Bullet Hell set in a wacky amusement park! Featuring a 3D environment that will challenge your ability to aim, shoot and dodge simultaneously!

name: Roll & Ball
description: Roll & Ball is an American Football board game where you can call plays and control a playmaker. Play with dice to control the balance of a play or without to determine the right play.

name: The Armardisp
description: A physics-puzzler in which you drive around a little tank and knock down buildings from afar.

name: Flies Flies Flies
description: 6-episode visual novel. One day, Finn Flynn wakes up in the body of a housefly. Without the use of his voice, he'll have to enlist his prankster ex-boyfriend, and his dads, an insectophobic mad scientist and a punk rocker, to solve the mystery of his transformation, and maybe get his life back?

name: Cannon Fotter
description: Cannon Fotter is a first person VR tower destruction game. Shoot yourself out of a cannon and destroy things with your body.

name: Late Night Delivery: The Bewitched Collection
description: Experience the horrifying Halloween-themed sensual mischievousness of "Late Night Delivery: The Bewitched Collection"! Now with an exclusive third chapter that expands on the plot further. Buy it today, enjoy it tonight~

name: Bronzebeard's Tavern
description: A multiplayer tavern management game.

name: Pirates of Rectangular
description: Pirates of Rectangular is a small indie game in which you fight against pirates in the Rectangular Seas on behalf of the Shape Alliance. Maneuver your ship as skillfully as possible and sink your opponents to end the discussions about the best shape of the geometric world once and for all!

name: Pekoratchi
description: Pekoratchi is an Tamagotchi Nano model based around the Hololive virtual YouTuber Usada Pekora.

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince
description:
Journey into a fantastical world on a quest for revenge in DRAGON QUEST MONSTERS: The Dark Prince.

Psaro is cursed and is unable to harm anything with monster blood. Now, he must become a Monster Wrangler to create an army for battle.

The hunt for high-ranked monsters takes Psaro through the ever-changing seasons of Nadiria and its unique environments, with rivers of bubbling lava, mysterious ancient ruins, and soaring towers of cake. Along the way, Psaro meets the kind-hearted elf, Rose, who joins his adventure to seek out ever-stronger monsters.

The key to Psaro's success lies with synthesis: the ability to combine two monsters and create a stronger offspring. Each new creation brings Psaro one step closer to his goal of becoming the Master of Monsterkind.

name: Batman: Arkham Trilogy
description:
A bundle including the three main entries of the Batman: Arkham series: Batman: Arkham Asylum, Batman: Arkham City, and Batman: Arkham Knight.

It includes all previously released DLCs.

name: How To Build Your Igloo
description: Skate your way in a grid-based arctic world and watch your new igloo grow as you help our friend Siku solve puzzles full of snow, creaks and ice cubes!

name: Append
description: Destroy friends or strangers in this online multiplayer bullet heaven/hell shooter. Collect powerups, combine weapons, build your defenses and obliterate the opposition. Hundreds of weapon combinations and multiple game modes.

name: Soulknight Survivor
description: Soulknight Survivor is a topdown action-roguelite game. Survive the waves of enemys to unlock new areas. Level up your character and loot equipment to gain power. Craft new powerful equipment and upgrade the buildings of your hometown. Follow your way to become the Soulknight.

name: Ananse and the Pot of Wisdom
description: Embark on a magical journey inside the first story ever told. Do you have what it takes to obtain the Pot of Wisdom from the Sky God?

name: Blue Maiden
description: Blue Maiden is a psychological horror game that takes place in a traditional Japanese neighborhood.

name: Murder Mystery Paradox: Fifteen Years of Summer
description: Murder Mystery Paradox: Fifteen Years of Summer is a mystery visual novel where you enter the remote and sparsely populated island of Shikinejima and attempt to solve the strangely recurring mystery found there.

name: LOFI Katana
description: Welcome to your musical sanctuary. LOFI Katana is a VR Rhythm game where you have to hit shurikens with your katana and hold your fan in the right position as the music plays. Unlike other rhythm games, a unique gameplay can be generated for any song, allowing you to play the music you like !

name: Tunnet
description: Build, debug and optimize a computer network in an underground facility.

name: Dreamwalker
description: A visual novel about a man who discovers the existence of another dimension hidden in dreams. Explore and learn the rules of a new reality, meet fellow dreamwalkers and solve the mystery of a disaster in the past. Make decisions, build relationships and strive to reach the best ending!

name: Wheel Stars
description: Welcome to a new racing universe. Wheel Stars is the first free-to-play battle royale multiplayer racing game of its kind. A game where you compete and cooperate with your squad to win challenging and fun competitions.

name: HotBunz
description: Hot Bunz is a physics-based 2D Platformer Party Game with one goal - players must navigate their characters through an obstacle course with rotating rings to collect as many gold coins in a series of increasingly complex levels.

name: SteamWorld Build
description: In SteamWorld Build, you must escape a dying planet by building a mining town to dig up vital long-lost technology. Meet the ever-growing needs of your citizens, trade resources and defend your mine from the creatures that lurk below.

name: Ludde
description: Explore a charming winter world with Ludde and discover various exciting, challenging, and fun activities for all ages!

name: Punihi Loader 2
description: "Punihi Loader 2" is customizable mecha third-person shooter in which the one-headed mysterious cute creature "Punihi" rides and fights in unique mecha. Customize your mecha by combining over 100 parts. You can also change the clothes of "Punihi". Create your own ultimate mecha.

name: Elves of Duty
description: A fast-paced couch party game for 1-4 players. Compete to deliver the most gifts in a range of dicey arenas. Take advantage of ridiculous power-ups as you blaze your way to first place and test the limits of your friendships.

name: Reign of Dwarf
description: Survive, farm, and conquer, that's the philosophy of Reign of Dwarf. We provide you the tools, you choose how to use them. Go to war, make alliances, or hide away from the world, the only morals will be the ones you choose.

name: Notice me, Leena-senpai!
description: Oh no! The Demon Lord is attacking! Help Leena-senpai defend her town against a horde of demon lord goons!

name: Cat Leather Jackets
description: Cat Leather Jackets is a rhythm/visual novel game hybrid about a teenage punk rock band. Follow Priya and her friends as they write, rehearse and perform songs, all the while dealing with the frustrations and drama of being young and trying to figure out what life is all about.

name: DVR Simulator
description: DVR Simulator is a Drone Racing FPV Simulator. Learn how to fly or start training right now with racing or freestyle modes. Do you have a VR headset? Use it to simulate FPV Goggles!

name: Rogue Masters
description: Rogue Masters is a 6 player co-op horde survival game with souls-like combat and extensive character customization where you fight Entropy in long-lost civilizations.

name: Our Dear Kingdom
description: Raise Our Dear Kingdom from a small village to an empire with big castles!

name: The Wanted Man's House
description:
In "The Wanted Man's House," plunge into the shadows of a slasher suspense, inspired by iconic horror films from the '80s and '90s. Take on the role of Mason, a daring adventurer in pursuit of fame, determined to break into the infamous residence of the sought-after killer known as "Baby Face."

The story unfolds as Mason, armed with courage and a camera, discovers that the location of the house has been inadvertently revealed by his own friends. His goal? Record every chilling moment to expose the terror in the city's newspaper. However, things take an unexpected turn when Baby Face returns home. Are you ready to face the nightmare?

name: The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor
description:
The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor is an award-winning interactive horror from Stefan Vogt, the acclaimed author of Hibernated and The Curse of Rabenstein.

Take on the role of novelist Thomas King and his wife Cora as they move into a remote Scottish manor house, just days before Christmas 1986. Seeking inspiration for his next book, Thomas begins to explore the history of Blackwood Manor, only to uncover a dark secret that dates back centuries to the days of the Great Scottish Witch Hunts.

The Ghosts of Blackwood Manor is a complex interactive fiction piece written in Infocom's advanced Z-machine format XZIP. The game has three different endings, a bad, a neutral and a good ending, depending on the player's choices. It is very likely that the player, on a first playthrough, will not reach the good ending, even though it is possible. Reaching the bad or neutral ending first is part of the experience and helps the player understanding the true intentions of some of the NPCs and the impact of decisions made, so they may be reconsidered.

name: Green Hell VR: The Spirits of Amazonia Part 1
description: In this story expansion, you will experience a new adventure that serves as a prequel to the main story of Green Hell VR. Once again, step into the shoes of Jake Higgins and do your best to gain the trust of the Mu’agi tribe, the chief of an indigenous Amazonian village. To do this, you must complete missions based on local legends, help tribe members, and provide supplies for the village. All of this, of course, is tailored specifically for VR.

name: N64 SP Map Jam
description: The first ever Single Player Map Jam for the Quake 2 Re-Release, hosted by the Map-Center community. Featuring nine new maps in the N64 theme, a hub level, and a final boss, as well as custom pre-rendered cutscenes.

name: For a Vast Future: Colour Palette 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Suikarad Gold
description: Suika clone

name: Geometric Brothers + Advance Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Toree Jolly Jam
description: Toree Jolly Jam is a short little, speed based, one level 3D Platformer, in a wintery holiday coating, that rewards the player with certain goodies. Finishing the level will grant the player several bonus "presents" to choose from, containing different surprises. These could be anything from new characters (or multiple characters at once!) to completely different minigames. There is even an old fashioned retro styled "sound test" hidden in there somewhere (as pointless as it might be nowadays).

name: The Brimstone Project: Odyssey Live
description: At The Brimstone Project, you will be tested in various ways. Control drones, find data on target individuals, and gain access to the necessary information. Throughout, you'll be in constant contact with Anna, your contact at the Initiative. Diverse puzzles await you, demanding different skills. But beware: your actions have consequences. Depending on how well you perform, the course of the story will change.

name: Terra Alia
description: Welcome to Terra Alia, an exceptional realm where the lines blur between technology, magic, and language. Designed to captivate and educate--transforming language learning into an interactive experience. Technology, magic, and language are intricately intertwined, creating a compelling educational escapade that transcends conventional learning paradigms.

name: Forklift Extreme: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dino Get Out!
description: Get ready for a unique adventure! Join our jumping dinosaur in his exciting mission to escape from a world full of challenges in this platform game.

name: Turok Trilogy Bundle
description: Turok is back and no dinosaur is safe! When it was first released in 1997, Turok introduced gamers to a world teeming with cunning enemies, traps, puzzles and deadly weapons all within a vast 3D environment ready to explore.

name: Pombo Piorado 2
description: A Celeste-inspired game.

name: Escape from Castle Claymount
description: A sinister foe has imprisoned you in a fortress made of clay. Work together with your cellmates to solve the mysteries of this place and Escape From Castle Claymount, the latest escape-the-room game by Colorbomb.

name: Dai Sengoku Rance
description: Japanese mod which expands the main story of Sengoku Rance, giving an option to 'continue' onto the main continent after uniting JAPAN.

name: Thief: The Black Parade
description: The Black Parade is an unofficial expansion for Thief Gold and a love letter to Thief: The Dark Project. Shadows and silence are your allies. Light is your enemy. Stealth and cunning are your tools. And the riches of others are yours for the taking.

name: Hawked: Ruby Raider Pack
description: Uncover the hidden treasures of X-Isle with the Ruby Raider Pack. Includes a new Weapon Skin, Backpack, Hoverboard, and Traverser!

name: World War: D-Day Part Two
description: A Reality single play FPS game set in World War II! This time, the airborne forces will be in action in Operation Overlord! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons!

name: Breakout Birdie Panic 2
description: A fast-paced, birdie-bouncing game of skill and reflexes!

name: Breakout Birdie Panic
description: A fast-paced, birdie-bouncing game of skill and reflexes!

name: Breakout Birdie Puzzle
description: A mind-bending, block-swapping extravaganza!

name: Breakout Birdie Puzzle 2
description: A mind-bending, block-swapping extravaganza!

name: Breakout Birdie Escape
description: A trail-twisting, brainteasing puzzle game!

name: Breakout Birdie Escape 2
description: A trail-twisting, brainteasing puzzle game!

name: For a Vast Future: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Furi Demake: The Chain
description: Fight your way free in this 8-bit-inspired version of Furi's first boss fight against The Chain. Frantic action, nervous controls, a blend of shoot and sword fight reimagined in 90s style. Only 1 boss fight! A gift to Furi's fans.

name: Pinball M: Death Save Bundle
description: Get ready to tilt into terror with one convenient bundle! Get all launch tables for Pinball M with a discount and draw first blood on the leaderboards.

name: Arcade Archives: Scramble Formation
description:
Scramble into the skies of Tokio!
Master the formation change!

name: American Truck Simulator: Farm Machinery
description: Saddle up drivers, because the Farm Machinery DLC for American Truck Simulator has arrived! Transport everything from trusty tractors to forage harvesters and mobile silos across scenic virtual highways and roads.

name: Pinball M: Chucky's Killer Pinball
description: After you play, you'll wish Chucky's Killer Pinball was only make-believe! Step into a twisted realm where the innocent becomes sinister, and the playful turns menacing. Navigate through an eerie playfield where Chucky lurks in the shadows, ready to pounce.

name: Pinball M: Dead by Daylight Pinball
description: Step into the realm of horror with Dead by Daylight Pinball. Become the hunter or even the hunted in a thrilling fusion of classic pinball and the excitement of one of the most popular horror games ever created.

name: Pinball M: The Thing Pinball
description: Immerse yourself in the thrilling and suspenseful world of Universal Pictures' classic film - The Thing. Use your pinball skills and battle against the shape-shifting alien through the arctic chill of U.S. Outpost #31. Can you trust anyone, even yourself?

name: Basketball Arcade
description: The Basketball Arcade Machine simulator.

name: Make it! Takoyaki
description: It's a street-food classic: a takoyaki-making challenge! Make as much takoyaki as you can!

name: Hitman: Blood Money Reprisal
description: A new version of Hitman: Blood Money. Hitman: Blood Money Reprisal stars Agent 47, an assassin dispatching targets all around the world. The new version introduces some new mechanics, such as instinct mode and a minimap.

name: Space Junk Seekers
description: Steal a mysterious hologram. Quit your job. Dig through humanity's trash.

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Cretaceous Predator Pack
description: Introduce four ferocious new predators to your parks with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Cretaceous Predator Pack. Manage and control these striking dinosaurs as they fight for dominance in your parks and search for their next meal.

name: Coloring Pixels: Advent 5 Pack
description: This Advent-themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels!Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true Advent calendar!

name: Buzz Cut Simulation
description: A Korean man enjoys simulating the process of getting a buzz cut in a game. Click to choose whether to do the buzz cut or not

name: AI.Gears: Team Tag Battle
description: "AI.Gears" offers innovative robot combat with diverse, customizable robots and 1v1 matches. Featuring reinforcement learning AI, it provides rich PvP and PvE content for a diverse combat experience. Join the world of varied robot battles in "AI.Gears."

name: Hentai Tales Vol. 2: Hitomi and Sea Trip
description: Continuation of exciting puzzles with a new plot and even more stunning anime illustrations.

name: Ace Racers SP
description: Import, build, and export arena courses for space drone racing. Customize your ships thrust and rates, and work on your manual thrust skills.

name: Corpse Master Carnage
description: Welcome to Corpse Master Carnage!A survivor round-based hell-shooter game where your objective is to survive endless hordes of demons while improving your attributes and gaining more power and new abilities, as well as exploring and progressing through the game's story.

name: Assembly Line 2: Mobile Version
description: Build and optimize your assembly line to make the most money possible!

name: American Isekai: Legends of Nipponia
description: 250 years ago, on the world of Nipponia, twin siblings Taneela and Tanaka seek to become Adventurers like their father. On the day of their registration, they are contacted by Mavis, the Crystal being of their world. Can they gather enough forces to stand against the rising evil in their world?

name: Spiritus 2
description: The survival horror concludes in part two of SPIRITUS, set in a post-apocalyptic city and the depths of pure evil. Survive in classic 90's gaming tropes augmented with modern HD graphics.

name: Bloki
description: BLOKI is an educational game in which you'll transform into a designer of residential building facades from the Soviet era. Using the available set of tools and guidance from the moderator, you'll design facades and develop the nearby area.

name: Draw & Color Maze: Paint Labyrinth Puzzle
description: An exciting puzzle game in which you and a snail will have to go to a mysterious labyrinth and paint it with magic paint!

name: Toasterball + Buissons Bundle
description: Enjoy two couch games with this bundle!

name: Chronical
description: The power is at your fingertips! Take control of a powerful Chronomancer in this mysterious puzzle-platformer. Explore the Chronical school to discover its secrets and learn new spells. Can you save all of the professors and reveal the mystery of the Time Loop?

name: Harvest Havoc
description: A mix of farming and slapstick combat, Harvest Havoc is a chaotic multiplayer PvP party game for 2-6 players. Grow, harvest, (steal) and sell your crops to win! Fight with your fists or grow some weapons to smack your rivals and take their crops. Gather your friends online and compete to become the best farmer-warrior!

name: Hungry Cats
description: The cats at home are already crazy with hunger, hurry back and feed them!

name: Swarmhunters
description: Swarmhunters is a top-down arena action shooter. The war between human and bugs has become worse - Project Swarmhunters emerged at this situation. You play as the best space soldiers in the galaxy and your mission is to strike the hive and hunt down the Emperor, supreme commander of bugs.

name: Tower Walker: MMO Grind Simulator - Tower Walker: The Lich
description: TOWER WALKER: THE LICH adds 1 new playable class with a unique set of skills and a special summon to the game

name: What Games Does Your Dad Play
description: What games does your dad play - It is a management game with the theme of running a game center, and players can replay a variety of stalls, electronic games, etc. from the 80s, 90s, and even 2000s.

name: Last Escape: Dead Complex
description: Dead Complex is a 2D Top Down, Survival Horror Game. Sneak, Loot and Fight your way out of an infested apartment complex and begin your final escape from the city.

name: Gateway to the Kulikovo Field: The Battle of Yepifan
description: Find yourself in the center of a decisive battle for Russian lands. You are a 16th century Sagittarius. Repel the Crimean army, show valor and ingenuity in battle. Whether the enemy reaches Moscow or not depends on you!

name: Happy Wonderland Solitaire
description: Enjoy the popular card game with 150 different solitaire variants and a beautiful winter ambiance! The game includes solitaire variants such as Freecell, Fan, Four Seasons, Klondike, Spider, Bakers Dozen, Canfield, Golf, Sir Tommy and many more.

name: Eye of Nollyn
description: A detective game in which you play as the private eye of Nollyn, the fictional city where money is what counts and what rules. Bribe people for additional clues, solve cases, and experience the captivating story with unexpected plot twists.

name: MoeMoni Land
description: In"MoeMoni Land",you can see the cub forms of 21 well-known monsters,such as the big dog,the wine swallowing boy,and the white faced fox.They possess unique skills but each has their own devils.You and your friends can play the role of a demon cub and stage a brain burning social reasoning drama.

name: SGS Battle For: Madrid
description: With Battle for Madrid, relive the Nationalists most determined attempt to take the Republican capital of spain from November 1936 to February 1937.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Drukhari
description: The Drukhari are an ancient race that fell into degeneracy and depravity, with their remnants only surviving in immense Webway cities.

name: The Paupers
description: On a special day, spirits emerge, seeking your assistance for a seamless journey to the beyond. Listen to their requests and gather the essential items to aid their passage into the afterlife. It's your task to cater to the spirits' needs in this mysterious yet delightfully comical journey!

name: Nightwatch: Nightmare Creatures
description: Nightwatch: Nightmare Creatures is a horror game for one or two players. Your task will be to restore and repair the equipment as well... avoiding victims of megacorporation experiments.

name: World of Warcraft Classic: Season of Discovery
description: Seasonal content arrives to World of Warcraft Classic, adding new playstyles to previous classes, reimagined instances, new PvP areas, and more.

name: Sniper Elite VR: Winter Warrior
description: Grab your rifle and make your way behind enemy lines with Sniper Elite VR: Winter Warrior.

name: Meadow: Striped Polecat and Leopard Skin Pack
description: Transform the look of your favourite animals in Meadow! This pack contains two skins: one Striped Polecat skin for the Fox and one Leopard skin for the Lynx.

name: Escape the Farm
description: Take on the role of an intrepid chicken to attempt daring escapes from the tyranny of your farmyard masters. Use a variety of tools at your disposal in this 3D puzzle platformer as you run, jump, and flap your way to freedom.

name: Hidden Series 2
description: Experience the engaging and addictive Hidden Series 2 game to find the hidden objects across 30+ challenging levels. We have carefully crafted the puzzles which will give the ultimate challenges unlimited fun and allow you to relax.

name: Scary School Simulator 2
description: Escape from horror anime ghost story in your school's classroom!

name: DesperaDrops
description: A crime-romance set in Summer 2028, Italy where exchange student Mika Amamine finds herself embroiled in murder case and she is a suspect. While being escorted to be further interrogated, she is freed when her vehicle gets overturned in an incident–on top of all this there is a mysterious assailant who is after Mika’s “powers” and she finds herself trying to escape both the police and the assailant with 6 other people who all have a criminal past.

name: Mother's Embrace
description: 'Mother's Embrace' - indie horror game set in a remote Latvian town, where the unforgiving winter serves as the backdrop to a harrowing story. You return here only to find your childhood home eerily deserted, its once welcoming streets now shrouded in a deafening silence.

name: Yeah! Wow! Hey!
description: High difficulty multiplayer 3D platform jumping game. The high requirement for view control plus less tolerance creates more challenging levels.

name: Cookie Run: The Darkest Night - Chapter 1
description:
You will play as a not-so-brave cookie named GingerBrave, must find the courage to battle his enemies and solve puzzles to grow into the courageous leader he was destined to be. Along the way, he meets a color cast of ally cookies to help him on this journey.

Step into the immersive world of CookieRun and experience life from a unique perspective – that of a small, freshly baked Cookie. Your journey starts with a daring escape from an oven, setting the stage for an epic adventure.

name: Hentai Hunter
description: Are you ready to embark on this extraordinary journey, discover secrets, and find the keys to the chastity belts? Enter a magical fantasy world and take on extraordinary challenges as the Hentai Hunter!

name: Skibidi: Escape from Toilets
description: "Skibidi: Escape from Toilets" is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. TV MANs are trying to get through creepy and atmospheric locations that are filled with dangerous SKIBIDI TOILETS - they want to kill you! Free content updates with new levels and game modes - YES YES YES!

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1946
description: It is said that every end is a new beginning. And while we all know the Second World War ended in 1945, Panzer Corps 2 is making the unprecedented leap to continue the Axis Operations with one final, grand installment.

name: Drive Zone Online
description:
Multiplayer car simulator. Racing & Driving game with a big open-world online!

Drive Zone Online is a car driving simulator. Burn your tires on the asphalt and explore "Grand Car Parking City" and the world around it. You can participate in street racing, drift racing, drag racing or invite a friend and drive around the city together.

name: Only Wish
description: Dive into Only Wish, where doors reveal secrets, chairs become treasures, and cars drive you into a vertical world of endless wonder!

name: Bug Bash
description: Get ready to unleash your inner exterminator in Bug Bash! In this thrilling and interactive game, players wield a virtual flipflop to squash pesky bugs as they scuttle across the screen.

name: Play Minigames with Reiko
description: Build an unbreakable friendship with Reiko as you earn tickets and have fun with over 30 minigames in the exciting world of 'Play Minigames with Reiko'.

name: Gloomy Village
description: Gloomy Village is an erotic adventure with elements of survival. You are in the role of a big-breasted treasure hunter and adventurer - Evelyn.

name: Matchpoop
description: Step into a world overrun by mischievous poops! Rally allies, employ match-N mechanics to battle and flush them down the drain. Conquer poop overlords, reclaim the bathroom in this addicting game!

name: Stimmings
description: Stimmings is a rogue like and real time strategy experience where units must be coerced into performing activities to snowball your colony into a winning state.

name: The Nascent Necromancer
description: When you're falsely accused of sorcery, corrupt inquisitors make you the object of a witch hunt. Now, sorcery might be the only way for you to survive.

name: Gensei Suikoden Plus
description: A remake of Gensei Suikoden for NIntendo Switch.

name: Guardian: Planet Defense
description: Take command of an orbiting defense satellite in this action-packed planetary defense shooter. Blast away at waves of incoming asteroids and crafty aliens before they destroy your planet. Scavenge powerful weapons from vanquished alien ships and turn them against your foes. How long can you survive?

name: Hope of Bion
description: Hope of Bion is an adventure game with a lean towards story and atmosphere. Visit different locations, examine the objects of environment and fight enemies using weapons of melee and ranged combat.

name: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling - Special Edition
description: The special edition of Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling comes with a drama CD and bonus booklet.

name: Breaking Survivors
description: Brick-breaking gameplay meets Survivors-like mechanics. Use your balls to destroy bricks, level up and pick upgrades to hold your ground against waves of incoming bricks and try to high score in this roguelite brick breaking game.

name: SOS OPS!
description: Attention, heroes! Are you ready to answer the call of duty and become an integral part of an elite rescue team? Step into the boots of an emergency firefighter in this thrilling multiplayer game and experience the adrenaline-pumping world of high-stakes firefighting.

name: Pinball M
description: Get ready to tilt into terror. The new horror-inspired pinball platform for fearless players. Prove your skills on the most sinister, gory, and badass tables ever brought to life.

name: Sons of Saturn
description: Sons of Saturn is an adventure game focused on atmosphere and narrative, brought to life using photos of real life abandoned locations as assets. Experience both wonder and horror as you explore the underground city of Minerva, where the dead dream and memories cling to life.

name: Bakeru
description: A 3D action game starring taiko drum-wielding tanuki boy Bakeru, who assumes the form of a human, going on a journey to save Japan from the clutches of a festival army led by the notorious Oracle Saitaro.

name: Dinosaur Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date? - 2 Winter of our Discontent
description: Go beyond the dinosaur apocalypse in this DLC sequel to Dinosaur Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date?.

name: Eight Winds
description: A fast paced, highly technical 3D fighting game with an incredibly high skill ceiling and a large amount of freedom for self-expression

name: Pixel Cafe
description: Join a small-town girl on this coming-of-age story about family, relationships, coffee and life in the big city. Immerse yourself in the perfect blend of an arcade-style time manager and visual novel, exploring dual storylines and a beautifully crafted pixel art world in Pixel Cafe.

name: Yard Sale Simulator
description: An open world yard sale simulator. Buy, repair and sell your way to the top. Shop yard sales, hold your own yard sale, buy a market stand, upgrade your stand or open a shop in town to sell all your newly acquired valuables.

name: Siheyuan
description: A single and local co-op action-puzzle game of few words, but lots of tiles. Move the falling blocks, pass them and pass them again to fill the grid, in this minimalistic test of coordination for 1-4 players of any age, inspired by the tradition of "siheyuan", historical courtyards of Beijing, China

name: Crashy Laps
description:
Crashy Laps is an arcade racing game, with all the track visible on the screen, designed for playing in Single Player and Local Multiplayer modes. Based on classic games, there are isometric and top-down selectable camera views.

Crashy Laps is a game to enjoy driving and overtaking aggressively where collisions and foul play are common, with a maximum of 4 Players. 20 little and funny tracks are waiting for you. In Single Player mode, you can also compete to reach the Best Time in the Leaderboard of each track.

name: Midnight Arrow
description: Hop on platforms and jump on walls to explore a vast immersive world. Discover different types of arrows and use them to solve puzzles and traverse this dimly lighted world.

name: Potion Brew
description: You need this game to forget about your life cares and become the best alchemist of this fantasy world with your friends! An alchemy shop keeper game offers you to brew potions for your customers, loot the ingredients in the forest, trade with sellers and compete with rivals.

name: Lair of Anubis
description: You became an archaeologist to uncover the truths of ancient civilisations. You heard a story about a pyramid hidden deep in the sand, accessible only once every few centuries. You didn't put much stock in the story, but decided to investigate it anyway.

name: Markus Ritter: Ghosts of the Past
description: In front of you lies a classic FMV point and click adventure game. Can you stop a serial killer who is murdering his way through Vienna? Experience a week in the life of Markus Ritter, who really just wants to lie on the couch at home, but suddenly has to juggle a job, love and the supernatural.

name: Rock Simulator 2
description: Rock Simulator 2 is a multiplayer, meditative idle game with many secrets to uncover. Begin your journey in the rocky tundra to relax and earn stones to unlock rocks, environments, ambients, or weather presets!

name: American Truck Simulator: Kansas
description:
Introducing Kansas! A U.S State that is home to a truly authentic cowboy culture and miles of land littered with wildflowers. Located in the Midwest of the USA, Kansas is known for its native grasslands, streams, abundant blue skies, and green grassland vistas.

Once considered to be the country’s agricultural heartland, "The Sunflower State" has managed to attract many large businesses and develop in other industrial areas due to its central location and convenient infrastructure for logistics operations. But, as the nickname suggests, nature is certainly doing very well to keep up with technological progress, as the state parks and vast prairies offer unique views with a marvelous atmosphere that will leave every trucker passing by with something to remember.

name: Witch's Potion: Water Sort Puzzle
description:
With an ultra-simple rule and control!
This is a puzzle game where you switch the water in the bottles to match the colors.
Seems easy but hard? Looks hard but easy!
A total of 1,000 brain-stimulating challenges for you.
Perfect for your spare time, but once you start, you can't stop!?

name: Execute Daddy: Papa ga Nandemo Shinu Game
description: In this ADV game, you become the administrator of a netherworld where you have lost both your memories and your body, and you have to recover your lost memories and body. The criminals who come back to life after execution after execution are cute, and their executions are like a show.

name: Lose Ctrl
description: LOSE CTRL is a game about control. A game that literally makes you lose control by changing the way your keyboard and mouse work. Also: Dark humor in a sarcastic and philosophical story and a fun/chaotic/weird multiplayer that you can play with your friends.

name: Reddoor
description: Survive endless waves of attacking zombie, earning points from killing.

name: Gangs of Sherwood
description: Fight the armies of the Sheriff of Nottingham and lead the rebellion, solo or in co-op with up to 4 players. Play as one of the Merry Men, combine your attacks, and free the people in this futuristic dystopia inspired by the legend of Robin Hood.

name: Turf Wars: A Snail Escape
description: Escape the garden in this snail-paced rougelike where you got to expand your turf or dry out trying. Danger lurks behind every bush, so just remember this one important rule: Stay. on. yellow!

name: The Ecdysis
description: The Ecdysis is a single player – third person episodic game that allows the player to live the life of Robin.jr, a professional photographer and takes you through the adventures and mysteries that he encounters on his journey.

name: Pingo Adventure
description: Pingo Adventure is a cute 3D platformer with interesting physics simulation. Follow Pingo to explore the world, solve puzzles, play mini games and even customize your Pingo with the costumes unlocked from the adventures!

name: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling
description: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling is a fandisc for Cupid Parasite.

name: Reaver
description: Reaver is an ultra-fast-paced FPS that endows you with the mobility and weapon mechanics to reave through arenas of killer machines with grace and efficiency. Push the boundaries of speed and style in this next-gen movement-shooter.

name: All of Us Are Dead
description: All of us are not dead. Our school has been infested with zombies, and we are still alive. Every day, our hopes of escaping this school become less and less likely. Follow us as we try to survive and escape our zombie-filled school. A visual novel based on the popular webcomic.

name: Goalgetter
description: The first First-Person Football Manager gives you the chance to make your dream, of becoming a top striker in one of the major European leagues, come true. You are a young and very gifted football player. Now you are getting the chance to play in the first league.

name: Rest
description: Rest is a walking simulator with a dark and beautiful aesthetic where the environment tells the story. Travel to a monochrome world, where you will experience an impactful narrative and journey through the stages of grief.

name: UAC Storage Surplus Project
description: The year is 2123. The UAC accidentally added 20 zeroes to its order of 1 crate. You are hired to vanquish the menace of the ludicrous amount of crates. Go, little Cratemaster, the Containment Area needs you!

name: Omega Nugget
description: Touch your screen to control Omega Nugget, only by steering left or right while automatically running forwards. Try to shoot down all the cars standing in your way and collect boosters to increase fire rate, fire power, health and other stats to help you complete each stage,

name: Anti Aircraft Artillery
description: A turret-based, arcade-style shooter where you try to defend yourself from an endless attack of kamikaze planes.

name: G-Mode Archives 52: Burger Time
description:
Drop it, swing it, and shake the pepper! The main character Peter Pepper is working hard to make hamburgers!!

"Burger Time" is an arcade game released by Data East in 1982.
This work was remade for feature phones in 2006.

Pass over the ingredients, drop them down, and complete all the hamburgers to clear the stage!

Avoid wieners and pickles that interfere with the completion of hamburgers by dropping them with the ingredients or interfering them. If you use pepper, you can temporarily stop.

Also, if you complete a new hamburger during the game, it will be added to the menu list.
Make various kinds of hamburgers, complete the menu list, and aim to clear all with a high score.

name: Deadly Nightmare Unwanted Heritage
description: Deadly Nightmare Unwanted Heritage brings you back to the nightmare world, where your mission it so try and break the curse before 6 AM. In the first Deadly Nightmare game, you played the role of John, but this time around you take the role of his grandmother. Surviving is not easy!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehog is a promotional mobile-browser game based on Sonic Superstars. The game was made to promote the December 2023 McDonald's Happy Meal campaign to promote the game.

name: Super Prehistoric World Adventure
description: Journey to the Stone Age. Fight dangerous enemies and bosses using strategy. Destroy barriers, explore worlds.

name: House of Jigsaw: Spooky Halloween
description: The Spooky Halloween expansion for House of Jigsaw: Happy Puzzling, Happy Home is a must-have for horror enthusiasts and puzzle fanatics alike.

name: Forza Motorsport 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT3
description: Forza Motorsport 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT3

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Animal Costume Pack
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: LEBL Airport
description: El Prat Airport graces the landscape southwest of Barcelona, Spain, representing a pivotal point in the nation's air travel network. Positioned as one of Spain's busiest airports, El Prat is a dynamic nexus, facilitating the seamless flow of passengers within a vibrant aviation ecosystem

name: Dr. Stone Battle Craft
description:
A war breaks out between the "Kingdom of Science" and the "Might Empire"!
Collect materials through battles, explore the world, create various items, and defeat your opponents!

name: Missing Parts
description: Find the missing part of the image to complete the image. Funny game for kids to recognize the images.

name: Drum Legend
description: Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music.In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores.

name: ADHD Arena
description: Let your ADHD loose and stack gems to accumulate points and get to higher more rewarding tiers, get the highest score you can by pushing gems around to organize and combine them and get lost in the joys of creating chaos the putting it into order.

name: Jigsaw Advent Calendar
description: Surprise yourself every day leading up to Christmas with new challenging jigsaw puzzles in Jigsaw Advent Calendar

name: Probot Soccer
description: Probot Soccer is a third person soccer-style sports game where the player controls a robot. The aim of the game is to kick the soccer ball into the AI robot opponent's goal. The game includes various levels of difficulty that increase the number of rounds to play against the AI opponent to win.

name: Where are my potatoes 2: Land Of Mystery
description: Kake potato character is coming back. Now Kake trashed in Land of Mystery where his mission is to collect different fruits and find again missing potatoes

name: The Piece
description: “The Piece” is a simple & fun block puzzle game, train your spatial ability!

name: Beast Collector
description: Beast Collector: Capture, Evolve, Battle in this thrilling card game adventure!

name: Sugar Fruits
description: Sugar Fruits offers a serene puzzle experience where you release a cascade of colorful fruits with strategic taps, aiming to align matching types for chain reactions and high scores before the basket overflows.

name: Wolf Sheep Cabbage
description: Wolves eat sheep, sheep eat vegetables. Utilize your wisdom to simultaneously transport the wolf, the sheep, and the cabbage to the destination!

name: Helle's Undersea City Project: Bringing Air to The Garden - Nakino Mashiro
description: Vtuber "Nagino Mashiro" is moving to the Garden! DLC with resident character implementation is now available.

name: Math Olympiad
description: In the mysterious continent full of monsters, encounter mysterious creatures, according to the clues left along the way, try to challenge, find the way to the new world.

name: Bubble Ball!
description: Combine balls of the same type to create bigger balls and earn as many points as possible without filling up the container in this cheery, casual puzzle game! And if you dare use the Ball Launcher, beware of bouncing balls to the stratosphere...

name: Where Cats?
description: Look for 100 cats. Delicately hand drawn scenes, lovely animal characters. Short process, which will not take up too much player time. No punishment, relaxed and happy. You can play with your family and friends on the same computer. It is suitable for all ages.

name: Wood Guy
description: Defy the laws of physics with the wooden puppet and journey through this 2D platformer in a 3D world of handicrafts! Play alone or with friends .... or against friends!

name: Punch Jump
description: Punch Jump is a diffcult/rage platformer. Your job is relatively simple: bring Carl to the top of the level. This will not be easy and the player will fail numerous times. This game is inspired by games like Jump King. It is a Foddian rage platformer.

name: Hentai Tales: Sex Apartment
description: There is a place called "Sex Apartment", which has an open sexual mind and is full of carnival every night. Here residents can visit any house at any time, invite or join them in the carnival. You are a new one who has just moved into "Sex Apartment". What will happen there?

name: The Exit 8
description: You are trapped in an endless underground passageway. Take a good look around and find a way to escape.

name: Lucky Mayor
description: This is a Rogue Deck-building game where you play as a mayor, recruit various citizens to earn coins, meet their needs, and submit enough coins by the deadline to complete challenges.

name: Trophy Hunt
description: Trophy Hunt is a silly multiplayer game all about stealing and defending trophies from your friends!

name: House of Jigsaw: Fascinating Landscapes
description: Escape into the serene yet treacherous world of natural wonders with the House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Nature DLC.

name: Gothic II: Complete Classic
description:
Continue the story of the Nameless Hero in Gothic II: Complete Classic, the award-winning sequel that improved on its predecessor in every way. Experience it now for the first time on Nintendo Switch.

Gothic II: Complete Classic brings together the excitement of Gothic II and the add-on Night of the Raven to your fingertips for the first time on a console.

name: Velocity Ventures
description: Embark on a thrilling platforming adventure in 'Velocity Ventures.' With bow and arrow combat system, 20 levels ranging with different difficulties, speedrun mode, and global leaderboards, test your skills and claim your spot at the top!

name: Shape Quiz
description: -Shape Quiz- is a knowledge game with guessing elements.

name: Final Resistance
description: Fortress Besieged is a cartoon style game that combines strategy and leisure. You need to control a castle surrounded by various monsters, collect resources, make equipment, and arm your warriors to defend it to the end in this prison like castle!

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Liberation
description: “Soldiers, Sailors, and Airmen of the Allied Expeditionary Force: you are about to embark upon the Great Crusade!” This DLC introduces the western front action in 1944, featuring the US faction, as well as German western front content.

name: The Last Train
description: In a desolate wasteland on the brink of extinction, the last train sets off towards the surface, rumored to carry passengers in search of a place to survive. A creature named Eilf boards the train, determined to reach the vanished final destination—Spring.

name: Flat Spot
description: Manage your team to motorsport glory and leave your opposition behind. Flat Spot is a casual motorsport management game that let's you experience fast-paced races, fun encounters off-track and the excitement of owning a team and helping it win the world championship.

name: Alice in Dinerland
description: Embark on a whimsical and treacherous journey through a twisted version of Wonderland in "Alive in Dinerland," a gripping survival game inspired by the beloved tale of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Will You Wheel?
description: Transform your rusty vehicle into a powerful race car by skillfully installing various parts. Engage in a variety of money-making activities such as woodcutting, nocturnal racing, or pizza delivery. Perhaps you're interested in managing a workshop for yourself? The possibilities are endless!

name: Labrys
description: Labrys is a multiplayer (up to 1v5) horror game where players are thrown into a randomly generated labyrinth against a minotaur. Play as the minotaur or one of up to five human players trying to escape the labyrinth while avoiding the minotaur.

name: On the Brink
description: Manipulate the gravity of galaxies to traverse the universe, solve puzzles, reignite constellations, and uncover the mysteries of Project: Almagest to find your way home.

name: Cy: Cyberpunk Survivors
description: Cy is a psionic superheroine battling to save humanity against hordes of zombies, mutants, and killer robots with only her ever-evolving mental powers to protect her. Will she survive the sinister onslaught or is she destined to become just another victim of an evil, unfathomable intelligence?

name: Tevi
description: A new game from the creators of Rabi-Ribi, embark on an epic action-adventure as you slash, dash, and combo your way through a sprawling land scarred by conflict. Explore and discover hidden secrets. Customize your build to triumph in spectacular boss fights and unravel the mysteries of the world in TEVI, a bullet hell metroidvania!

name: The Muller-Powell Principle
description: You awake and find yourself in a parallel dimension. The year is 2032. All you can remember is that you’ve been participating in some kind of experiment that went horribly wrong. Travel through parallel worlds to get back home and uncover your past in this puzzle game where sci-fi meets surrealism.

name: Time Walker: Dark World
description: This is a roguelike auto chess game with automatic combat. Players need to adjust the formation, plan resources, and match the skills provided in the loot to different occupations. to meet the challenges of the next wave.

name: Wizordum
description: Wizordum is a retro-inspired FPS with a focus on action and light puzzles. It blends the best features of classic fantasy shooters from the 90s with some modern aspects making it a unique experience. Take the role of a Cleric and fight against Chaos that roams the land - smash, burn and loot!

name: Soul Dog TD
description: Tower defense game with one Soul Dog and six units. You don't always have to fight with a full team in battle. Strengthen your army efficiently by collecting souls with Soul Dogs and training your units according to the situation. Can you defend the 30 Wave with your leadership?

name: The Highrise
description: THE HIGHRISE is a first-person survival game set in a high-rise building that has been sealed off by an alien monster invasion. Gather resources to make fighting weapons and survival tools. You must find and send a rescue signal at the end of your desperate survival.

name: Orten Was the Case
description: Orten Was The Case - A Groundhog day in "Orten". Control Ziggy who's stuck in a time loop and uncover millenia-old mysteries in the caves and tunnels deep down below Orten, a suburb to a fictional Swedish metropolis.

name: Pluto's Island
description: Harvest souls and cast them into a volcano to appease petty local deities.

name: Cross Blitz
description: Cross Blitz is an exciting turn-based RPG card battler set in a wondrous world teeming with vibrant characters and fierce battles. Explore Cross Dawn Isle and uncover its secrets as you level up, craft new cards, build the perfect deck and battle your way to victory!

name: Forest Grove
description: A teenage heiress has gone missing. Foul play is suspected. Uncover a cast of characters, collect evidence, and find the truth in this futuristic detective game!

name: Davigo
description: Davigo is a VR vs. PC physics-based battle game. Become the giant in VR or a small knight on PC and fight your friends in local or online matches.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Nambu Line (Kawasaki to Tachikawa) E233-8000 series Nambu Branchi Line (Hamakawasaki to Shitte) 205-1000 series Tsurumi Line (Tsurumi to Ogimachi,Okawa,Umi-Shibaura) 205-1100 series
description:
The Nambu Line is a 35.5 km long line connecting Kawasaki Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Tachikawa Station in Tachikawa City, Tokyo.
The Nambu Branch Line is a 4.1 km long line connecting Shitte Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Hama-Kawasaki Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture.
The Tsurumi Line is a 9.7 km long line connecting Tsurumi Station in Yokohama City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Ogimachi Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture.
In addition to the main line connecting Tsurumi Station and Ogimachi, the line has two branch lines: the Umi-Shibaura branch line, which branches off from Asano Station and connects to Umi-Shibaura Station, and the Okawa branch line, which branches off from Musashi-Shiraishi Station and connects to Okawa Station.

name: Monster Saga: Evolution
description: Start an Adventure with Cute Pets! MMORPG 2023, another world adventure "Monster Saga: Evolution"! Invite your Pet and friends to go on an adventure in another world! Explore the mysterious story of the Continent of Light together and write your own legend along the way!

name: The Case of the Murdered Matriarch
description: A classic point-and-click noir murder mystery presented entirely within Google Slides.

name: Daughters of the Stars Episode 2: Face the Setting Sun: A Fierce Flower Stands Strong!
description: It's been a week since Eve first transformed into her magical girl alter ego, but she hasn't been able to transform since. When a fierce enemy attacks her and her friends after school, one she can't stop on her own, a new magical girl stands up to stop it.

name: Daughters of the Stars Episode 1: When A Star Burns Out, A Flower Blooms
description: Evelyn Lima is starting the second semester of her Sophomore year of high school. When she discovers magical powers and has to fight a monster, everything she thought she knew changes.

name: Daughters of the Stars
description:
Evelyn Lima is a 15 year old sophomore who's simply trying to get by in high school. All she wants is to spend time with her best friends in peace, not be bothered by bullies, and get through high school without any incident. That all changes in the new year of 199X, as she awakens to magical powers from the cosmos, and now has to figure out why she of all people has them.

Daughters of the Stars is an episodic visual novel starring Evelyn Lima, which takes place in New York in 199X. Play as her as she navigates school, daily life, hanging out with friends, and going against bullies and bad guys.

name: Isekai Neet Engineer Eiyuu ni Naru
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Virtua Fighter 3tb Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Cook, Serve, Delicious, Trilogy!
description: A trilogy of the most delicious games ever made, with over 200+ hours of gameplay, massive campaigns and local co-op, and so much more.

name: Puzzle Vacations: Australia and New Zealand
description: Relax and enjoy more than 120 unique puzzles featuring high-quality images showcasing the landscape and culture from the land down under!

name: The Castles of Burgundy: Map Pack 2
description: The "Map Pack 2" DLC an be purchased to gain 9 new Maps to play. It contains Map 13a-13h and 14. Owning the base game of Castles of Burgundy is needed to play.

name: The Castles of Burgundy: Map Pack 1
description: Map Pack 1 DLC can be purchased to gain 9 new Maps to play. It contains Map 10a-10h and 11. Owning the base game of Castles of Burgundy is needed to play.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Classics Vehicle Pack #2
description: Two legendary vehicles from 1982 and 1985 return to Dakar. The vintage Lada Niva 1600 4x4 and the iconic Honda Africa Twin pave their way across the desert.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Hybrid Vehicle Pack
description: Race across the desert with these future-facing Hybrid Vehicles. Featuring the GCK Motorsport, the Hino 600 Hybrid, and the Riwald Renault C460.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: SnowRunner Cars Pack
description: SnowRunner Cars join the world of Dakar! Drive five new vehicles in Rally Raid competition or Free-Roam mode and level up your off-road experience.

name: Dead by Daylight: Chucky Chapter
description: Meet your new best friend ‘til the end. Dead by Daylight: Chucky brings an iconic horror legend into The Fog with a new Killer: The Good Guy - Chucky. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Charm: Good Guys Box.

name: Puppet Master: The Game - Movie Edition Blade + Execution
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-packed experience with the Movie Edition Blade Pack! Dive into the action with a fully revamped Blade character model, a cutting-edge Weapon Model featuring a brand-new brutal Execution for Blade. Customize your combat style with 6 stunning weapon skins. Blade is geared up and prepared for battle, showcasing his fierce prowess with the Axis Termination emote!

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Danny
description: A kind and intelligent Victim with a rough exterior, Danny is desperately searching for his missing girlfriend, Maria.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Nancy
description: Bring home Nancy, possibly the most heinous and disturbed Family member of them all!

name: Banana Drama: Tiger
description: Wow a tiger! Get the incredibly cute and sleepy Banana Drama tiger with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama animals. He is particularly proud of his beautiful coat and regularly impresses many female tigers with it.

name: Banana Drama: Lion King
description: Roaarrrr - the Lion! Get the incredibly proud Banana Drama lion with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run faster than others. A lion throwing bananas is a little unusual at first glance, but he has learnt this effective fighting technique from the monke(y)s!

name: Banana Drama: Strong Offense Animals Pack
description: Get all "strong offense" animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Banana Drama: Strong Defense Animals Pack
description: Get all "strong defense" animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Banana Drama: Giraffe
description: Helicopter giraffe! Get the excited Banana Drama giraffe with this DLC. She has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders. Sometimes she gets so excited that she can't stop spinning her head like a helicopter. Let's hope she doesn't fly away!

name: Banana Drama: Deer
description: Oh deer! Get the incredibly shy Banana Drama deer with this DLC. He has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others. It's lucky that there are no roads or cars in Banana Drama, because that would be fatal for the deer!

name: Banana Drama: Cow
description: Cow (moo)! Get the incredibly sassy Banana Drama cow with this DLC. The cow has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others. The cow is very self-confident and often likes to show off its beautiful udder!

name: Banana Drama: Cockatoo
description: Fly cockatoo! Get the incredibly agile Banana Drama cockatoo with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run/fly faster than others. Similar to his best friend "Kiki the cockatoo" his abilities are often underestimated due to his cute looks!

name: Banana Drama: Balanced Animals Pack
description: Get all "balanced" animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Banana Drama: Alpaca
description: Alpapaca! Get the incredibly fluffy Banana Drama alpaca with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama aimals. Unfortunately, he is allergic to bananas and therefore often sneezes - his sneezing is often mistaken for spitting.

name: Banana Drama: All Animals Pack
description: Get all animals of the Banana Drama universe! With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Wish
description:
A Dream of Dragons

The door to the Pale Heart remains locked. And in the wake of our endeavor with the Hive, an ancient mystery turns our gaze to the Dreaming City, to the last of the Ahamkara, and to the place of the Fifteenth Wish.

The key to the Pale Heart cannot be taken. It must be granted.

name: Killer Instinct: Anniversary Edition
description:
The 10th Anniversary Update brings with it two versions of KI:

The Killer Instinct Base Game will be FREE TO PLAY on all platforms: Xbox consoles (One, Series X|S), Windows PC, and Steam. The free KI base game will feature one free weekly rotating Fighter and Single-Player, Local, and Ranked modes.

The Killer Instinct Anniversary Edition will include all 29 Fighters, and all Premium Content ever released: the VIP Double XP Booster, holiday accessories, and more. This edition replaces the "Definitive Edition," which was delisted upon release of the Anniversary Edition.

The 10th Anniversary Update will go even further, with a few more changes:

- Improved matchmaking. We want to make it easier for folks to find matches quickly, regardless of which platform they’re playing on.
- Optimization for Series X|S consoles.
- Balance updates. That’s right – new meta for Killer Instinct, more than five years after the last adjustments!

The following Mature-rated content included in KI Definitive Edition will NOT be included in the Anniversary Edition:
- Definitive Edition App (featuring developer interviews, concept art, Killer Cuts soundtrack)
- Xbox KI Classic 1 & 2
- But DON’T WORRY! If you already own Killer Instinct Definitive Edition digitally, you will still be able to download the above content even after the Definitive Edition is retired.

name: Mom Simulator 2023
description: Discover the beauty in the daily chaos of motherhood. Cook, clean, nurture, and thrive in a world of endless love and challenges.

name: HelloWorldFactory
description: A quick programming language quiz is now available! Just read the code and choose a compiler that can output "Hello World"! A simple game you can play in your free time!

name: Color Splash: Animals
description: Color Splash: Animals is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable animals and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful animal paintings.

name: Medville
description: Medville is an indie, single player, real time city builder game. It features complex supply chains of 40 artifacts, a money economy, multiple towns, land and water transportation, designing custom buildings and individually simulated villagers with their own agendas.

name: Sex Simulator: Vampires
description: An interactive Sex Simulation game with Visual Novel elements, featuring HD graphics and hot animations. Play the role of a handsome century-old Vampire Prince and seduce three sexy mortals to spend eternity by your side as your loving vampire concubines.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Labrador Retriever
description: Introducing the Labrador Retriever, your faithful new hunting partner! This popular and versatile breed can fetch a variety of small game on land or in water.

name: Warpzone Drifter 2
description: With full throttle and no breaks, Warpzone Drifter 2 is a minimalistic, retro-hardcore, physics-based, drifter minigame.

name: ClearIt 16
description: Try ClearIt 16, an innovative matching game for those looking for a new challenge! Use bombs and lightning to clear any obstacles you encounter. There are no time limits, so relax and have fun.

name: Suicide Guy VR: Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: 4Tacos
description: Help Mr. PG and Cleto the goose to protect the Divine Taco from the dinosaurs, in this game inspired by the beat em up of the 90s, use special powers, travel the streets of the distant nation Tacotitlan, know its folklore, its food and its secrets.

name: Oh Darling! I Hate To Tell You This...
description: Little Darling makes a wish at the place where all the wishes come true. Then her journey begins. She has to fight against the monsters with the power of light.

name: Weapon Shop Decillionaire
description: Weapon Shop Decillionaire is an idle game where weapons turn your dreams of wealth into reality. Build and sell equipment, use the profit to enhance it, while mastering strategic weapon placement on your shop's grid. It's time to become a decillionaire, one sword at a time!

name: Echoes of Fear
description: Solve clues left by the valley's previous inhabitants to determine the location of the Artifact. Your task is simple. Get in, get the artifact, and get out.. Alive.

name: Weekend Solitaire: Summer village
description: It's time to take on Solitaire Challenge. Pass the game's several stages. Conquer challenging card configurations and take on a big, vibrant game with several levels of varying difficulties. Overcome challenges, create combinations, and get bonuses.

name: Redrum Hotel
description: Redrum Hotel is a short, first-person horror adventure game. Roam around the haunted hotel, collecting strangely scattered notes and avoiding the evil presence that seeks to rid you of your sanity.

name: Monster Coming
description: "Monster Coming" is a fast-paced survivor roguelite game. Dark cracks suddenly appeared in the sky, and a tide of beasts emerged from them to invade humans. You stand up as one of the braves, face the menacing beast tide, choose your equipment, formulate tactics, and feel unparalleled.

name: 18 Minutes
description: 18 Minutes is a single player FPS that combines stealthy precision with heart-pounding action. Engage in intense firefights, strategically infiltrate enemy base, and make split- second decision to outmaneuver enemy. Get ready for a gaming experience that offers the best of stealth and FPS action

name: StarL2
description: Enjoy StarL2 a lovely fresh take on Match 3 games! A huge and colorful game with numerous levels of varying complexity. You must demolish tiles. You may build rows or lines of three by swapping adjacent stones. Collect more than three gems to unlock further goods.

name: One More Shooter Game
description: Your mission is simple but crucial: you must eliminate a specific number of enemies in each level to advance. The planet relies on your shooting skills to prevent the plague of these enemies from expanding.

name: Interstellar Impact
description: Stylized single player adventure game. Explore the vastness of space, collide with smaller objects, avoid larger objects, grow until you explode and become a black hole and set the fastest time possible.

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos - New Crops, Fish, and Recipes Pack
description: Become a master farmer, chef, and angler with the New Crops, Fish, and Recipes Pack! Unlock 12 new seed types (4 crops and 8 flowers), 6 new fish, and 15 new recipes!

name: Last Train Home
description: The Great War is over - the fight continues. Command a legion of soldiers, desperately trying to make their way home amidst the chaos of civil war. Lead them through the unforgiving wilderness onboard an armored train. Manage your crew and resources and try to survive.

name: Duke Nukem Collection 2
description:
Duke Nukem Collection 2 takes a deeper look into the history of the Duke Nukem Franchise!

Enter the third person world of Duke Nukem's adventures with Time to Kill and its sequel Land of the Babes. Then enjoy the handheld first person marvel that is Duke Nukem Advance, a completely original story. All available on one Evercade Cartridge with a full colour manual included.

name: Duke Nukem Collection 1
description:
He's back! Duke Nukem debuts on Evercade with this first collection, including the brand new Duke Nukem 1 + 2 Remastered!

Tackle the forces of Dr. Proton and fight off the evil Rigelatins in this rebuilt anthology of the first two Duke Nukem games. Then take the leap to 3D with the first person classic, Duke Nukem 3D: Total Meltdown. All presented here on one physical Evercade Cartridge and including a full colour manual.

name: Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered
description:
Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered is only available as part of Evercade's Duke Nukem Collection 1, planned for release in November 2023.

A new collection of the original Duke Nukem games that has been developed by Blaze Entertainment. Featuring multiple improvements to the early 90s computer classic including 60fps gameplay, upscaled graphics, parallax background and smooth scrolling, along with re-recorded music, a redesigned HUD, and widescreen support. With the ability to play the games as they were originally also included.

name: Pyrami Head
description: We are trying to escape from a dark and extremely disturbing mysterious place. We are trying to rescue our character, who has lost his memory and is waiting to be sacrificed, without getting caught by the enemies around and open the hidden areas of the room by exploring the surroundings.

name: Sky Survivors
description: Sky Survivors is an arena shooter roguelite. Choose from a variety of upgrades, unlock unique characters and weapons. Build «stairway to heaven» — a sky tower, each floor of which gives your character a unique bonus. Create your own overpowered build to survive against hordes of monsters!

name: Noctuary
description: Two young illuminators, Fancia and Alina, start their adventure in the bright and fascinating Inlixaland... ...in pursuit of becoming trustworthy "Arborangers."

name: Illuvium
description:
Step into the adrenaline-fueled Arena, where strategy and action converge. Whether facing the relentless waves of Illuvials in the Survival Arena or outwitting foes in competitive duels in the Ascendant Arena.

Illuvium: Overworld will be an expansive third-person RPG set within a diverse and dynamic open world. Across this alien terrain, mystical creatures lurk—each with potent abilities. Craft gear to explore, collect precious resources, and empower your team. Every decision shapes your path, carving out your legacy in the wilds of an alien world.

name: Landnav
description: Landnav is the ultimate adventure race. Plan. Prepare. Survive. Excel. Use real world navigation techniques to blaze your path across awe inspiring vistas. Become an unstoppable adventure athlete.

name: Goodboy Galaxy
description: A vibrant sci-fi platform adventure game for the Game Boy Advance, where you help Maxwell the dog explore unfamiliar worlds, make strange new friends and contend with mysterious forces - by jumping, shooting, slicing, shrinking, warping and drilling.

name: Dirty Crown Scandal
description:
Four men who demand a relationship under the pretext of survival.

“Have you never thought that if I can’t have it, I might as well ruin you?”

A chill ran down Matias’ spine at the sound of a voice that was kind and smooth, yet ominous.
The laughter had remained in the man’s face faded, replaced by a stark emotionless expression as he added dryly.

name: Rebirth of Myths: Dragonborn
description: Sin descripción

name: Devil Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: Divineko
description:
You play as a cat who casts spells by drawing increasingly complex shapes that match incoming enemies.

Throughout your journey, you will meet a wide range of enemy archetypes with unique gameplay mechanics, challenging bosses, and you will acquire divine abilities along the way (e.g. block attacks, slow down time, hit all enemies on screen). These abilities will help you rise to the top of the leaderboard in the Endless mode and achieve your end goal: establish your authority as the god of cats, the Divineko!

name: What Body?
description: 'What Body?' is a short clicker game, where you clear your room and befriend Mr. Policeman! Made for 20 Second Game Jam 2023.

name: Disney Junior Magical Holiday
description: Disney Junior Magical Holiday is a Christmas themed mini-game compilation featuring characters from Disney Junior shows.

name: Let's Find Larry!
description: While taking a stroll through the park you bump into your old bestest buddy from high school, Larry! Unfortunately for you he is very busy... Try to find him so you can say HI!

name: Mind's Descent Bundle
description:
The Gap - Driven by a rare neurological affliction plaguing his family, Joshua has to recover his memories by exploring parallel realities through déjà vu. Facing the innermost depths of his past – moments both joyous and painful – seems to be the only way to get his life and family back together.

Darkwood is a challenging survival horror that does not rely on jump scares.
Craft weapons, prepare traps, fortify hideouts - you will explore and scavenge the eerie forests of the Soviet Bloc by day, then hunker down in your hideout at night. With nightmarish forces corrupting the woods, wait and pray for the sun to come up the next morning.

name: First Time In Hawaii: Collector's Edition
description:
Kate and Nicole Robinson hit up Hawaii for a very special occassion: the wedding of their good friend Stella! Kate's got a date with with Hawaii!

In this Hidden Object game with a tropical twist, see all the local sights, experience all the local favorites and maybe even give your good friend Stella the best wedding ever!

name: Anime Dream
description: Sin descripción

name: 24H Stories: The Blackout
description: You are a young boy. Tonight, your parents have gone out, leaving you alone at home overnight. Soon after, strange things start happening: your head inexplicably starts to ache, you realize your brother is missing, and there's a sudden commotion outside the door...

name: Oh Yeah
description: How much imagination do you have about the ways of love?

name: Scroll Survival
description: Use the ultimate scroll to survive the endless influx of monsters!

name: Typing Battle
description: "Typing Battle" is a game based on typing speed and accuracy. In this game, players need to use the keyboard to input designated characters in order to defeat their opponents or achieve their goals.

name: Zumbido Seele
description: Indie arcade FPS singleplayer shooter where you fight against hordes of monsters and explore the map in search of equipment.

name: Tamara In The Forsaken Dungeon
description: Tamara In The Forsaken Dungeon is a third-person adventure, dark atmospheric puzzle game

name: Suika Shapes
description: Match a variety of colorful shapes in this addicting match two puzzle game in an ever-enclosing space

name: The Town Secrets
description: You're neighbor is suspicious! Go to his house and discover what he's doing.

name: Plunder Ball
description: Blast the zombie pirate horde away! Protect your treasure and fight for the high-score in this pinball-inspired shooting gallery.

name: Cats and Seek: Extra Level
description: 100 more cats for you to find!

name: Falling for Beans
description: Falling for Beans is a platformer where you must strategically descend a mystical Beanstalk, while you manage your health and outrun a Giant constantly on your tail. Do you think you can survive?

name: Cats and Seek: Osaka
description: Hey, do you have 5 minutes to spare? Let's play hide and seek with 100 cats in Osaka! Can you find them all?

name: Spacecraft Tactics
description: Spacecraft Tactics is a 2D turn-based tactical space game. Save the last rebel outpost in the campaign. Develop a strategy, execute it in tactical battles and micromanage your ship. Play various game modes single or multiplayer. Create your own ships, scenes or mods and share them.

name: Grappling Gunners: Arena FPS
description: Grappling Gunners is a free multiplayer FPS with two grappling shots for high-speed gunfights and full freedom of movement. Utilize seven skills, including teleportation and bullet time.

name: Danny's Debt is Eternal
description: Danny's Debt is Eternal is a short, humorous adult game with fantastical H-scenes and plenty of eye candy. Help him replay the princess, and see how well he is rewarded!

name: War Maze
description: War Maze is a turn based strategy game based on chess! Position yourself and take down the enemy pieces to win!

name: Gangs of Sherwood: Lionheart Edition
