description: Pre-purchase Gangs of Sherwood - Lionheart Edition and get the Prestige Skin Set free. Don your golden clothing to give the Sheriff's henchmen a thrashing with style. Also enjoy 72 hrs early access to the game.

name: Beyond Fantasy
description: Beyond Fantasy is a top-down shooter mixed with survivor-like elements. In-game mini-games give you the opportunity to acquire pets and colleague.

name: Shot Supreme
description: Sink baskets to score points, complete missions to buy upgrades, rinse and repeat. Shot Supreme is an arcade basketball game inspired by incremental games. Like a clicker, but you have to score baskets.

name: Death Requiem
description: Death Requiem is a survival fantasy game. You'll explore the dungeon and gothic environment to experience the grandeur of architecture. The rift in the universe has opened and get ready to fight against constant stream of enemies using your strategy and skill combination.

name: Monster Maker
description: This is a Xiuxian style role-playing game! In the game, build caves, capture spirit animals, and plant miraculous drugs. 360 degree lockless combat mode, even when flying in the sky, you can wave your long sleeve to move mountains and reclaim the sea.

name: Nitrojet
description: Nitrojet is a metroidvania where everything is destructible. Explore and survive this ruined world filled with deadly beasts with the help of your jetpack and blade.

name: Black Clover Mobile
description: Black Clover Mobile is a licensed RPG based on the popular anime series from "Shonen Jump" (Shueisha) and TV Tokyo. Immerse yourself in a magical fantasy world, experience classic original storylines while enjoying an easy to play strategy turn-based gameplay. Summon your favorite characters, cultivate a powerful magic knight squad, and embark on the journey to become the Wizard King.

name: Arrival of Beasts
description: Discover one of the hardest tower defense games with strategic elements, individual gameplay and challenging mechanics. Play together with your friends in co-op mode, create a team and compete with other players in the online ranking.

name: Test: The Game
description: A project created by midosei, who states that it was going to be something small and short, but it ended taking up three years to make. The whole project is made with default assets from RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Goodbye Tired Stars
description:
"What's the best place to watch the end of the universe?"

Accompany a cosmic being in finding a place among three different planets to watch the end of the universe from. And on the way, walk, observe, and remember...

name: Gaza SP
description:
One day a community wakes up to a great threat:
People who have lived there for more than a century are being evicted from their homes.
The invaders' pretext is that the land used to be theirs.
Every minute counts and the roar of the tractors gets closer and closer.
There is only one way to avoid the worst, and it won't be easy.

Welcome to Gaza - São Paulo.

name: Master Ninja: Shuriken Killer
description: Dive into the world of ninjas and prove yourself as the ultimate ninja master in this action-packed game!

name: Hoodie Survivor
description: Auto shooter score attack survival game where your character moves forward continuously and you control the direction of travel by rotating left and right

name: FlyKnight
description: Kings Field style bug-themed dungeon crawler with Runescape graphics

name: SKD
description: Challenging action-adventure with stylish characters and sick combat (soulslike inspired) in a furry anime world.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail x Wacca Collaboration Pack
description: The DLC includes a total of 8 songs, 3 gear skin, 1 notes skin, 9 emoticon, and 1 original theme.

name: Electoral Dynasty
description: A political-simulation watch-the-clock strategy game. Pass laws, executive orders, and deal with events, all while maintaining the balance of your nation's most important attributes. Will you manage to keep your coalition together or establish a dictatorship? Only you can decide, Prime Minister.

name: Seven Little Spider Kittens
description: It's a lovely day to lose your children, so go find your seven little spider kittens and bring them home in this relaxing hybrid VR platformer/shooter/eater

name: Shadow of Fear
description: In 'Shadow of Fear', your only purpose is to solve puzzles and then escape; You can also continue to survive, whether you can survive until the end depends on yourself

name: Falling Down
description: "Falling Down" tells the story of a young hero destined for heroics through a visually stunning action-platformer game.

name: Steel Thunder
description: Steel Thunder is an action-packed runner where you play as a knight and race through a castle while jumping and dodging obstacles to collect coins. The game is an exciting adventure that requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking to conquer each level.

name: Deep Blue Odyssey
description: Deep Blue Odyssey is a thrilling submarine running game that will test your reflexes and challenge your strategic thinking.

name: Eternal Roadster
description: Eternal Roadsteris an exciting and challenging game that will test your driving skills and reflexes. In this game, you'll be controlling a high-speed race car as it speeds down a never-ending road, constantly changing direction to avoid falling off and failing the game.

name: Chain Ninja
description: Chain Ninja is an exciting action-adventure game designed and developed by an experienced game development team. In the game, players need to play a chain ninja, traverse the entire room by hanging ropes in the air, obtain keys, and avoid various obstacles and traps in the level.

name: Vertex Rush
description: Vertex Rush - A Fast-Paced Climbing Adventure!

name: Octopus 21
description: Octopus 21 is a Homebrew version of the classic Game & Watch game "Octopus" for the Amstrad GX4000 and Amstrad CPC.

name: Dicy Chess
description:
Experience the full feeling of playing chess...
BUT WITH RANDOMNESS
At the start of each turn you roll a dice and the outcome determines how far you can move

name: Berserk Survivor
description: Berserk Survivor is a free Hack n Slash arena fan game, set in Kentaro Miura's "BERSERK" manga/anime universe. Survive astral world invasion playing as Guts from various Arcs, or complete a series of Challenges to buy itens with your rewards at the in-game store.

name: Farm Land: Puppy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Lasso Catch
description: Lasso Catch is a small and simple retro-inspired arcade game where you have to catch the cows with your lasso while also avoiding the wolves. How many can you catch?

name: Big D Randy
description: Randy is not playing around.. Collect all candy's on huge map and don't get caught!

name: Mad Jyacer
description: Bring healthy food to the finish line. Help your family lose weight!

name: I am a Fish Online
description: This is a multiplayer online RPG simulation survival game. You can chat casually, socialize and make friends, collect adventures, and obtain various achievements. Become a hero from a small fish. Fight bosses together. Keep your hunger, happiness, sleep, and unlock more fish. Like character, thanks.

name: Metal Breaker
description: A fast-paced, adult side scrolling shooter inspired by classic shoot-em-up games.

name: Coffee Brakes
description: Battle your friends in an office chair joust to the death! Only one of you can be employee of the month, so battle your friends in a variety of game modes and levels. Get on your office chairs and take your Coffee Brake! Coffee Brakes is a 3rd year project developed at Media Design School

name: Ethereal Enigma
description: Are you ready to take ghostbusting into your own hands? Find the elements to complete the ritual, and escape the room.

name: Hentai Milena
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: WooLoop: Nature Pack
description: This Nature-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore Autumn with these images of the outdoors! Create images of the natural world in all its beauty.

name: Cowpocalypse
description: A GameBoy-style arcade game, abduct cows to increase your score!

name: Topspace
description: A topdown bullet hell game where you control a spaceship and fight waves of asteroids and enemy spaceships.

name: Zombies Rising xXx
description: The undead menace has returned! Safeguard your territory and fortify your defenses in the thrilling Zombies Rising xXx.

name: CyVenge
description: CyVenge is a fast paced and action packed rougelite arena shooter. Choose from many upgradable weapons and abilities and help Cy fight against numerous waves of enemies!

name: Obby
description: run, jump, puzzle. Your tasks that you have to master in Obby with Kitty.

name: Joker Show: Horror Escape
description: Your parents left for the night, and you stayed at home alone, you were bored and you decided to call the Jester (Joker), but something went wrong... It looks like you succeeded, now the jester wants to play with you, hide and don't let him catch you, find a way to call the jester away.

name: Astrominer
description: Embark on an epic space adventure in AstroMiner, where you must build a base, overcome challenges, and construct a portal to return home from the asteroid belt.

name: Nordland Mahjongg
description: "Nordland Mahjongg" offers many hours of challenging gaming fun for both beginners and passionate Mahjongg players. Enjoy different, hand-drawn tiles sets that can be coordinated with beautiful backgrounds.

name: Criss Cross
description: Animation System Visual Novel "Criss Cross."

name: Secret Of World
description: Secret of World is an MMORPG that immerses players in a vast, dynamic world where they can choose from four distinct characters, each endowed with unique and special abilities. The game features a balanced gameplay style with a focus on Player vs. Monster (PvM) content, making up 70% of the experience, while Player vs. Player (PvP) battles account for the remaining 30%. Players can align themselves with one of the three powerful empires, each offering its own challenges and rewards. In Secret of World, strategy, skill, and alliances are key as you navigate a world filled with danger, adventure, and intense competition.

name: Alpha
description: Alpha, Book 1 is the first book of the Alpha series. It is followed by Alpha, Book 2.

name: Rewritten
description: A cozy, humorous fantasy romance that'll have you fall in love with reading all over again. If you can't pick a boy, pick them all! or give this quiz a spin.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pawfectly Designed: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: One Night: Burlesque - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Automobilista 2: Historical Track Pack Pt2
description: The Historical Track Pack Pt2 extends AMS2's Historical selection with four new versions of legendary circuits: Barcelona 1991, Montreal 1991 & Interlagos 1991 / 1993.

name: Automobilista 2: Formula HiTech
description: Formula HiTech features some of the most technologically advanced cars in the history of Grand Prix Racing. The cars are split in two classes from two distinct generations, each headlined by officially licensed Mclaren Racing cars.

name: Protocol 11: Super Cute Alien Legacy Edition
description: 1-4 players sci-fi adventure about friendship, love and what it means to be human. Featuring local multiplayer with Coop and Versus mode against your friends!

name: Dreamhaven
description: Unlock the doors to your wildest dreams with Dreamhaven! Designed by an extraordinary team of junior developers aged 8-14, players will travel, through the imaginations and dreams of the next generation. Interact with AI power npc's that can create open ended conversations.

name: True Reporter: Mystery of Mistwood
description: A free detective "Hidden object" game. Solve the crime now!

name: Hooligan Simulator 2023: You vs. System
description: In Hooligan Simulator, players are not subjected to trials but are presented with the audacious opportunity to express themselves through graffiti. Armed with the means to draw, you can assert your presence in society through free expression. By painting graffiti, vandalising public property, and leaving your mark, you become the embodiment of audacity. However, be aware that such actions make you a prime target for law enforcement.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Starter Edition
description: Tee yourself up for the perfect swing! Your first step into Golf With Your Friends has never looked so good!

name: Golf With Your Friends: Ultimate Edition
description: An easy hole in one for any Golf With Your Friends fan! Grab everything from hats to courses, and swing in style with this seriously decked out version.

name: Rally Race: Offroad Simulator
description: The thrill of victory awaits! Conquer challenging tracks, become a rally legend!

name: Virtualis World
description:
Virtualis is a new Play-to-Earn game where people can work in buildings as employees and earn USDT working, playing the game with PvP Battles, selling on Marketplace their NFTs and much more.

In the world of virtualis there are different cities with different structures. You will be able to choose your departure city upon your first log in, but you will still be able to navigate between them very easily.

name: Moto Rush GT: Elite Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ball Pit King 3D
description: Ball Pit King 3D is a fun and addictive puzzle game where you drop, stack and merge quirky 3D balls with hilarious faces to create the ultimate King Ball! Play and see if you can rule supreme over the Ball Pit!

name: Bumper Ball Bash
description: Big ball impact, brothers, come and impact me, and then you can get me.

name: Dino Survivors
description: Face hordes of Dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures in this survival game with minimalist gameplay! Dino Survivors is a casual game with Roguelite elements, where you need to be faster and survive several species of extinct animals. Your choices will determine this.

name: NBody
description: Place asteroids and planets and send them orbiting into targets in a physics-based puzzle game where everything attracts everything.

name: Super Elastic
description: The girl said that this game is really flexible, come and play together.

name: Train Traffic Manager
description: All Aboard the Chaos & Strategy Express!

name: Wonderland
description: Dive into fear in Wonderland, a first-person horror game where you navigate an abandoned mansion, solving puzzles and uncovering mysteries. Face chilling challenges, explore haunted rooms, and decipher the mansion's dark secrets. Can you survive the terror and unveil the truth?

name: Deep Sleep
description: A horror game about infinite dreams, where you need to constantly find abnormal places in the room to stay awake, otherwise you will fall into terrifying dreams

name: KurOba
description: KurOba, Selçuklu'dan Osmanlı'ya uzanan bir strateji oyunu. Medeniyetleri yönet, kaynakları kullan, tarihî olayları deneyimle ve savaş. Geleceğe yönlendir, kaynakları sürdürülebilir kullan. Tarihi bir yolculuk!

name: Pretty Girls Escape Plus
description: The "Plus" version is now available in the game "Pretty Girls Escape"! Slide the blocks left and right in the stage to connect and then erase them, and guide the characters to the exit! Collect costumes of 9 beautiful girls from idol groups, athletics clubs, and more, and have fun dressing them up!

name: Burglar's Bazaar
description: "Grow your business by stealing. Sell the stolen goods in your own shop. Don't get caught by landlords. Hide, steal, and sell! Provide good service to your customers!"

name: Shell's Kitchen
description: Dive into a fintastic culinary adventure where fish serve fish dishes to fishes, and scale new heights of seafood fun with your friends in this cooperative cooking game!

name: ArenaWar
description: FPS Arena Competitive multiplayer

name: Backwoods
description: You will survive in forest,build your base, craft items and grow crops.

name: Nut City Blues
description: A comedy-mystery visual novel about Captain Fox, Detective Raccoon and the danger of pineapple pizza.

name: Knights & Guns: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Prime Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Very Scary Backrooms Game
description: You have no weapons. You have no means of defending yourself. Some will chase you, some will outsmart you. If you are in danger, run and hide.

name: Galaxy Bricks
description: Two classic games collide to create one amazing experience you can always just pick up and play. Enjoy Endless levels and see how high of a score you can get.

name: Easy Red 2: Ardennes 1940 & 1944
description: Command history in Easy Red 2: Ardennes 1940 & 1944! Blitz through the early chaos of WWII's Invasion of France, then brace for the brutal winter battles of the Ardennes campaign. Will you rewrite the pages of history?

name: Trade Disturbance
description: Trade Disturbance is a hidden object game. Use a free overview of different zones and find the required things from the list to complete the level. The game uses your memory and attention to detail well.

name: Daily Thread: The Sewing of Discontent
description: Henrietta is a seamstress in early industrial Manchester, enjoying Victorian age manufactory work. Relive your favorite moments from Dickens, Zola, and Marx, learn about the history of working conditions and worker rights and how they got where they are today, and think of where they could still go!

name: Very Bad Dreams
description: Very Bad Dreams is an intense and demanding experience that will test your nerves. Forget everything you thought you knew about horror games, because Very Bad Dreams transcends the boundaries of the gaming experience. Developed by an independent French studio, it's much more than just a game.

name: Pixi Poxi Autorunner Lab
description: Pixi Poxi is a challenging autorunner rage puzzle platform game that will test the limits of your gaming skills. You will accompany a test subject on their quest to escape to freedom fighting through several levels with a variety of difficulties, traps and barriers!

name: The Protean Forest
description: The game "The Protean Forest" combines Rogue-Like card game and turn based mechanisms. Defeat demons by deploying and moving unit cards in the area and using skill cards at appropriate times. Uncovering the secret of The Protean Forest

name: Evil Diary
description: Evil diary is a shooting game where you control the character Eve with a mission to escape the city to survive in this apocalyptic world.

name: Max Twist
description: In this futuristic Xtreme Sport, players mount hover boards and spiral down a tube in space full of obstacles. Smoke speed records and set new max twists to a heart-pumping soundtrack. Inspired by games like 1080° Snowboarding, Max Twist takes the concept to the space age.

name: Witch Cram Sorceries
description: Play as Marietta, a new magic teacher, as she tries to guide and teach the new kids to become master of their magic.

name: GhostBros
description: Ghost Brothers is a rogue-lite where you control a snake of multiple heroes, each with their own attacks, passive skills, and classes. Inspired by the auto-chess genre, each hero in Snake has a set of classes, and combining enough heroes of the same class can give you additional class bonuses.

name: Geminism
description: Two twin sisters, Hirosoma Kikyou and Hirosoma Shinku, clash together in a nook of a midnight city. The fight is watched over by two mysterious men, Yamaga and Tsukishiro. Just what is at stake in their battle?

name: Pygmalion
description: Pygmalion is a puzzle game using the properties of colors. Clear the set stage by manipulating the color block. Removing all blocks within a certain number of times limits clears the stage.

name: Snakebird Complete
description: A console version of Snakebird that contains both Snakebird and Snakebird Primer and some minor adjustments.

name: Adventures of Helio
description: Adventures of Helio is a 2D platformer with a dark fantasy setting inspired by Central America. Fight scary enemies, overcome tough challenges, discover powers, and more through 60 levels.

name: Juicy Futa
description: A lewd Visual-Novel about Futas on an open island

name: Climax Heroines
description: Climax Heroines is a dungeon crawler about women with huge breasts trying to save their childhood home.

name: Guns and Spurs 2
description: Become a bounty hunter and capture the most wanted criminals of the West in a vast open world filled with life and activities.

name: Hell Let Loose: Pea Dot
description: Join the elite troops at the forefront of the combat with the Pea Dot DLC. This Erbsenmuster camouflage, commonly known as the pea dot pattern, worked to improve the camouflage characteristics of the uniform.

name: Rage: Anger Management
description: The Realm of Rage was a secret place, hidden from the eyes of mortals and gods alike. It was created by an ancient wizard, whose name was lost to time, as a sanctuary for himself and his fellow adventures. There, they could unleash their anger and frustration on anything they desired, without fear of consequences or death.

name: NaNoCollabMo: Autumn Harvest
description: 7 map WAD made to evoke the Autumn season. Fallen leaves, mushrooms, and lots of orange!

name: Suika World
description: Sin descripción

name: Live together Now
description:
Live togeter Now is mobile dating sim game.

When I opened my eyes, I suddenly had a girlfriend.
And the beginning of cohabitation.

The player becomes "Yujin", an ordinary college student and a protagonist who has never had a relationship before.
As the boyfriend of the lovely girlfriend "Serin", he works hard and proceeds with the story.

name: Akahane: After Class
description:
It's after classes today at Akahane Academy! Usually this is the time for students to go home or participate in club activities... However you're the teacher's assistant in class 1-B, and Takahashi-sensei wants you to stay for a little while...?

It smells like nothing but alcohol and sadness in his room! Why today? Maybe he has something to ask you... As new staff it's your duty to find out!

name: Locomalito Arcade Legends
description: Pay tribute to Locomalito's classic work with this collection, which includes the creator's best games.

name: Jerry's Autowalking Adventure to Rescue His Cheese
description:
This hack is Green Jerry’s first finished and released Kaizo hack.

It features 7 levels, each one with their own theme, and has only 1 route, so there are no secret exits.

name: Submarines
description: Submarines is a casual arcade-style game where players pilot a submarine through the ocean using intuitive thrust mechanics. Collect power-ups and weapons to navigate the levels, taking on enemy submarines and adversaries in a fun and engaging underwater experience.

name: Super Solitaire: Card Game
description: The King of Card Games

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Manga Free Pack
description: Directly from the Japanese comics comes an exaggerated duo of vehicles all wings and spoilers! The overpowered speedster Mad Manga and the roadster version Track Manga are ready for crazy rides and oversized fun!

name: Ride 5: Dreamer's Garage Pack
description: Collect the bikes everyone wants with Ride 5: Dreamer's Garage Pack and ride the Nevada track's most breathtaking views!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 1
description: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Logan, Grace, Elsie, and Qi in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 2
description: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Fang, Catori, Ernest, and Mi-an in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Starlight Collection 3
description: A starlight costume collection with outfits for Nia, Unsuur, Amirah, and Owen in 4 colors for each character. Each outfit contains a hat, top, bottoms, shoes, and 3 additional accessories.

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 3
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 2
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: My Time at Sandrock: Summer Heat Collection 1
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

name: Drawing Carnival: Horror Style
description: Sin descripción

name: Drawing Carnival: Anime Style
description: Sin descripción

name: Drawing Carnival
description:
Unleash your inner artist and create gorgeous paintings made in different art styles!

Grab your neon markers, spray paints, stick-on diamonds or glitter powder and use them to create amazing masterpieces!

Divide your favorite portrait or any painting into four parts. Choose what you're going to paint with, decide which colors you're going to use, create a perfect image and put the painting in a frame to sell it!

name: Astro Miner: Moons
description: Explore 12 moons and collect all the treasures using your new vehicles!

name: Astro Miner
description: Fly to extraordinary planets with different terrains and start mining valuable minerals to sell them in your base. Create corridors to reach stacks of crystals, or do it your own way and mine wherever you like with the help of dynamites. Hire workers and build an auto-miner machine to speed up your work!

name: ASMR Slicing: Nice Cuts DLC
description: Unlock new unique objects to slice, new funny knifes to cut with and get extra coins to spend!

name: ASMR Slicing: Joyful Cutting DLC
description: Unlock new unique objects to slice, new funny blades to cut with and get extra coins to spend!

name: Tricky Taps: Paint Power
description: Sin descripción

name: Tricky Taps
description: Use the levers to roll and bounce the ball along the twisty roads, without letting it drop or hit the spikes! Keep an eye out for tons of super-cool and tricky obstacles to jump and bounce out off or avoid.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Manga Pack
description: Directly from the Japanese comics comes the craziest and funniest cars, made up of huge spoilers and exaggerations from every point of view. Like Mad Manga, an oversized speedster from the Land of the Rising Sun ready to make every race a new story full of powerful victories. Only the madness of another all-spoiler racing car like Track Manga can - maybe - keep up with it. Track Manga is a roadster born for drifting, ready to draw the most daring trajectories on the track! With the Manga Free Pack, everything is oversized, the fun included!

name: Lampy
description: Lampy is a captivating puzzle-platformer where you guide the adorable cube, Lampy, through a world shrouded in darkness. Use Lampy warm glow to light up the path, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover the heartfelt story of his quest to find his way home.

name: Train Valley 2: Community Edition
description: Drive forward the industrial revolution in this train tycoon micro-management game!

name: On the Axis
description: Discover the simplicity and relaxation within On The Axis. An easy and calm puzzle game focused on mirrors and tiles.

name: Raven Simulator
description: Isn't that too complex living as a human being? Then live your life as a raven and enjoy as you can!

name: Survival Fantasy
description: SURVIVAL FANTASY, the most frenetic survival/waves action roguelike with platforms! Annihilate hundreds of monsters with your bow or your sword, collect items to enhance your abilities and demonstrate your skills on a huge map full of enemies with one purpose: kill you.

name: 40 Seconds
description: A hidden object puzzle game inspired by public health issues related to suicide.

name: Reptile Chronicles
description: "Reptile Chronicles" immerses players in a vivid 3D fantasy PVP arena where they wield powerful magic, from fireballs to laser beams, battling opponents in real-time multiplayer duels. Dive into the realm of reptiles and prove your dominance!

name: Tank Captain
description: Tank Captain "is a strategic warfare game where players will play the role of commander and engage in different tank combinations to enhance the refined attributes of tanks and artillery. They can enhance their attack or armor abilities according to their preferences and win the war.

name: Devilish Blind Date
description: This game is heavily inspired by『Vampire Survivors』 You are summoned into an Isekai and fighting monsters with a mysterious girl, Nanako.

name: The Unvisited Grandma
description: How long have you been visiting your grandmother?

name: Hidden World 8 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Criminal Behavior
description: Use your thinking and analytical abilities to solve crimes scenes. There is a burglar on the loose, and he is breaking into all types of buildings in order to steal expensive items. We need you to find clues and piece together a cohesive picture of each crime scene.

name: Doomer Farm
description: Doomer Farm - is a farm simulator set in a doomer post-punk atmosphere. Manage the farm, build factories, and avoid health inspectors.

name: Domino: The Little One
description: Domino, an hand-drawn 2D adventure game, invites you to traverse a realm where the perils of global warming and ecological catastrophe manifest as monstrous entities, and the only weapon at your disposal is your wit and will to make a change.

name: Banana Co.
description: Banana Co. is a first person horror game in which you're placed into a terrifying banana factory where you have to avoid the dangers that await you. You're given no instructions but to collect bananas around the factory.

name: Fishing Online
description: Fishing Online is a cartoony fishing online meta-verse that you and your friends can join anytime, anywhere and collect tons of fishes

name: Meadow: Streaked Tenrec and Leopard Cub Skin Pack
description: Transform the look of your favourite animals in Meadow! This pack contains two skins: one Streaked Tenrec skin for the Hedgehog and one Leopard Cub skin for the Lynx Cub.

name: To Victory
description: This is a single player strategy management game.Base on a randomly generated map.It includes construction, trading, strategy, and management elements . Players need to make decisions to achieve the final victory.

name: Pixel Gun Master
description: Pixel Gunmaster is a roguelike shooter action game about a protagonist who is turned into a demon and goes on a journey to undo his wish. Will you be able to defeat powerful bosses and return to human form?

name: Pallet Panic
description: Dive into 'Pallet Panic,' an action-packed forklift frenzy that blends strategic logistics with fast-paced fun. Manage the chaos of a vibrant factory, combining, lifting, and racing to become the ultimate forklift operator. Unleash your skills in this whimsical world of cartoony mayhem!

name: Command Center Earth
description: There's an influx of meteors heading for Earth! Save Earth from total annihilation by piloting a missile through a variety of unique and punishingly difficult asteroid fields.

name: Call fur Help
description: Call for Help immerses you in the exciting world of firecat firefighters. Save the city as a brave feline firefighter! Tackle fires, clear obstacles, and showcase your courage in cooperative mode with friends. Action awaits around every corner!

name: Topswap
description: Topswap: A high-octane, shape-shifting FPS.

name: Deleted
description: Take control of a powerful drone and prepare to face off against hordes of enemies standing in your way. Collect currency and upgrade your drone with new weapons and skills. Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?

name: Harmony
description: Out maneuver your opponent without letting them leverage your own pieces against you. play against your friends or the computer to see if you can bring balance to the board.

name: Thursday Nite Thunkin'
description: I'm not sure why there are two descriptions but pretend I put something really funny here

name: Namariel Legends: Iron Lord - Collector's Edition
description: Free your people from the Iron Lord's merciless grasp!

name: B-B0 The Delivery Bot
description: A 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a cute lil robot whose sole purpose is delivering packages (on time)!

name: Swarm Horror
description: Swarm Horror is a survival horror game in which the player must progress while defeating insects. The goal of the game is to escape from the feeding ground of the insects you have wandered into. The insects call their friends to feed on you.

name: DuDu Kingdom
description: The lovely dudu lives alone in the deep forest, needs to collect fruit and honey to go home every day, can you help him?

name: Ninja Issen
description:
Ninja Issen is Asteroid-J’s game that features hyper ninja action adventure in the cyberpunk world.
You, “Kiba,” must use everything in your hands against powerful foes. Look for your chance under the fierce moves of gigantic bosses, and sting like a bee and cut off their limbs!

name: Tallowmere 2: Curse of the Kittens
description: Lady Tallowmere's kittens have been acting strange. Still, the dungeon's rituals must be carried out. Despite the unusual circumstances, how many rooms can you clear?

name: Nonogram 3D: Mega Puzzle
description: Nonogram 3D: Mega puzzle is a logic and puzzle-solving game. Analyze the hints, then break and paint the puzzles to reveal hidden shapes. Inspired by nonograms (or picross), this 3D variant adds depth to the game while remaining accessible.

name: Dynasty Warriors M
description: Restore peace to China by conquering other rivaling factions through multiple officers and figures from the Three Kingdoms era.

name: Demi Daggers
description: Take the cursed dagger, use its power to dispatch the horrors from this hellish place, score the best time! A fan game based on Devils Daggers for PICO-8.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Season Pass 2
description:
"The AEW: Fight Forever Season Pass 2" includes access to even more AEW wrestlers and the brand new single player game mode Beat the Elite

- AEW: Fight Forever Dynamite featuring The Acclaimed
- AEW: Fight Forever Beat the Elite
- AEW: Fight Forever The STORM is coming!"

name: To Altare
description: A small platformer fan game where you bounce your way up to find Altare.

name: War in Space
description:
It's my first game, but I'm working on improving and developing it every day. Suggestions for improvements or new features, modes or whatever in the comments.
Thank you!

War in space is a roguelike in the future where you fight against different enemies to defend yourself and get better equipped.
Can you save the universe and improve your life on your spaceship?

name: Pixel Paint 2: Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Comic Coloring Book: Complete Edition - Sketch Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Music
description: Play through the world of the Master of Music as a young bard setting out to explore new territory using his trusty lute and the power of music to destroy his enemies.

name: UpTogether.io
description:
Up Together is a multiplayer 3D obby / obstacle course platformer game where you jump, climb, and bounce your way to the top of the level!

Jump with your friends or alone. There are lots of fun characters to choose from, including Taco, Baguette, Hot Dog and more. Try for a spot on the leaderboard if you're up for the challenge!

name: G-Mode Archives 51: Trio the Punch
description:
"Trio the Punch" is an arcade action game released by Data East in 1990.

Players choose one of the unique characters, such as "Santos" the tough guy, "Kamakura-kun" the ninja, and "Rosesub" the swordsman.

If you defeat the enemies in the stage and get a heart, and defeat the boss who appears by collecting all the hearts, you will clear the stage.

Of course, "Mr. Chin's roulette corner" is also alive and well.
If you draw a hit, you can benefit from increasing your HP and increasing your attack power, so let's push your eyes so that you can get a more effective bonus.

name: Soul Knight Prequel
description: Soul Knight Prequel is a pixel-art action RPG featuring loot farming. Slash monsters to upgrade your power, or party up for treasure against the odds. Our newest ARPG continues to feature Soul Knight's familiar posse of chibi characters, while satiating the fans' hunger for more lore and quests!

name: Naiko's Room
description:
"The handless clock may shatter, but it will never stop ticking."

Naiko's Room is an RPG Maker psychological horror game about a monotonous life, a priceless purpose and an old, rotten friendship. A guiding light for the abandoned, a Room where the past, present and future will collide until The End of all.

Follow an introverted girl who ends up in a room with no door, as she does her daily routine. Read books, experience nightmares and find flower scented memories in a journey to gather the will to get out.

But remember, there's someone out there waiting for you outside...

name: Forza Motorsport 2019: McLaren #03 720S GT3
description: Forza Motorsport 2019 McLaren #03 720S GT3

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Dynamite featuring The Acclaimed
description: The boldest Tag Team in AEW history, Anthony Bowens and Max Caster of The Acclaimed, PLUS the brand new Dynamite themed arena kick off AEW: Fight Forever's Season 2 DLC series.

name: SnowRunner: Kenworth W990
description: Expand your SnowRunner garage with the 2023 Kenworth W990! This Heavy-class truck brings superior on-road capabilities thanks to its retractable axle and superior fuel capacity. The Kenworth W990 is not included in the Year 1, Year 2 or Year 3 Pass.

name: SnowRunner: Jack of All Treads Tire Pack
description: You can customize your SnowRunner experience further with the Jack of All Treads Tire Pack, adding over 50 unique tire & rim combinations for your whole fleet!

name: 8Floor Bundle
description:
This pack includes:
Gnomes Garden 5: Halloween
Gnomes Garden 7: Christmas Story
Lost Artifacts: Frozen Queen

name: All My Dreams are the Same!
description: A short interactive story about artistic sensibilities, dreams, and the real world.

name: Mamiya: DoomsDayDreams
description: Mamiya: DoomsDayDreams is the thrilling final part of the dark mystery visual novel Mamiya, in which in which a group of young men struggle against existential dread before the end of the world.

name: Arcade Archives: Warp & Warp
description:
"WARP & WARP" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1981.
Players travel between two worlds as they progress: a space world where they fight with guns, and a maze world where they fight with time bombs.
Try for a high score by taking down the MYSTERY BEM that spawn under set conditions, or by taking out multiple enemies with a single explosion!

name: Guess the Word
description: Guess the 5-letter word in the 5 tries. If you don't, then you don't. You can try again.

name: Hedra
description: Hedra is an early access, Unreal Engine 5-powered sandbox focused on geometric play and a community-driven design experiment. Manipulate a world through diverse modes like survival and puzzles. Your actions and feedback not only shape the world but also its ongoing development.

name: Ashes of Sombtir
description: Ashes of Sombtir, the rpg where you follow the rules.

name: Avo Escape Space
description: Avo Escape Space is a dystopian, story-driven escape the room style VR game set in outer space! Assisted by Avo, the spaceship's AI system, you embark on a journey to escape your doomed vessel. To do so, you must engage your mind with a series of intricate and mind-bending puzzles!

name: Big Ball Sports
description: Experience sports in a whole new dimension with Big Ball Sports!

name: Dee's Nuts 2
description: Dee is back, in an all new game of grabbing Dee's nuts. Fill your tree to the brim with nuts before the winter season. This time you can race your friends in an all new single player, up to 3 person multiplayer experience and battle to collect the most nuts.

name: Ghosts of Oblivion
description: A strategy game in which you need to create a deck of cards and defend against waves of opponents using different tactics by combining them. Armies of evil spirits have attacked our world and you have to fight back the hordes of monsters!

name: Hidden World 7 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.
